definition: wife of mother's brother/aunt/maternal uncle's wife

sentences.english: Elizabeth then  contrived to sit by her aunt.
sentences.chinese: 伊丽莎白在舅母身旁坐下来。

sentences.english: Her aunt now called her to look at a picture.
sentences.chinese: 她的舅母叫她去看一张画像。

sentences.english: But I have an aunt, too, who must not be longer neglected.
sentences.chinese: 可惜我也有一位舅母，再不能不回信给她了。

sentences.english: Jenny and David are Robert and Sally's aunt and uncle.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮和大卫是罗伯特和莎莉的舅母和舅父。

sentences.english: My dear aunt, how could you think of it?
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的舅母，你怎么会想到这上面去了？

sentences.english: The kindness of my uncle and aunt can never be requited.
sentences.chinese: 舅舅和舅母的恩典今生今世也报不了。

sentences.english: After the girl's parents died, she was made a ward of her uncle and aunt.
sentences.chinese: 这女孩的父母双亡后，舅父和舅母成了她的监护人。

sentences.english: When they arrived at Longbourn, Elizabeth and her aunt were able to help Jane in looking after the children.
sentences.chinese: 到了浪搏恩后，伊丽莎白和舅母帮着简照看孩子们。

sentences.english: My dear aunt, how could you think of it?Mr.
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的舅母，你怎么会想到这上面去了？

sentences.english: I went to aunt's house with the family the other day.
sentences.chinese: 前一拜，我同我屋企人一齐去了舅母的家。

sentences.english: My dear aunt, this is being serious indeed.
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的舅母，你真是郑重其事。

sentences.english: You must not blame my aunt.
The truth is, we dont know which Aunt Molly is now the real one.
sentences.chinese: 事实是，我们现在也搞不清哪个莫利舅母是真的。

sentences.english: The waitress who served me is your aunt.
sentences.chinese: 为我服务的那位女侍者是你的舅母。

sentences.english: In some ways, my uncle and auntie were both almost always fully present.
sentences.chinese: 在某些方面，我的舅舅和舅母是全身心投入当下的人。

definition: older brother's wife/sister-in-law/(polite address to a younger married woman) sister
(old) dowager/old lady (title for the mother of a noble or an official)
wife of father's elder brother/aunt/(polite form of address for a woman who is about the age of one's mother)/CL:個|个[ge4]
father's female cousin via female line
wife of older male cousin via female line
